name: Sim Jong Un
description:
How long would you last as the Dear Leader?

Assume the role of Kim Jong Un and attempt to balance internal and external politics in order to avoid being deposed or starting a war with South Korea.

Created for Ludum Dare Jam 33, theme "You are the Monster" http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=56114

Also available as standalone, if the WebGL build doesn't work for some reason:
